definition: time rate wage/remuneration based on one's time and skill/opposite: piece rate wage 計件工資|计件工资[ji4 jian4 gong1 zi1]
to calculate/to compute/to count/to regard as important/to plan/ruse/meter/gauge

sentences.english: The bad news is that even as economic production slowly lifts off the floor, the economy is sitting on hours and wages.
sentences.chinese: 而壞消息是，依靠計時工資的收入增長緩慢。

sentences.english: When an hourly employee makes a mistake, it could cost money.
sentences.chinese: 當拿計時工資的工人產生錯誤時，會造成成本。

sentences.english: The time-rate wage system carried out in the enterprise is welcomed by the employees.
sentences.chinese: 這家企業實行的計時工資制受到員工們的歡迎。
